item.title: Flight Deck Communications Systems (SATCOM Iridium Datalink)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures are established and used.

numlitem.para: Place associated selector switch in voice mode (USB).
If Datalink is not available in VHF, HF and SATCOM modes, complete Flight Data coupon as described in FOM, Chapter 3 on each leg, and submit white copy to Operations personnel at arrival gateway.

note.para: Any mode which is operative may be used.

placard.para: Placard near HF Control Panel "L(R) HF SATCOM DATALINK INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
